fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: Andre is a software architect with 20 years of development experience. He moved into telecoms developing big data high-transactional infrastructure before delving into mobile security and cryptography. His last five years have been spent building FinTech solutions and leveraging blockchain technology to provide cost-reducing financial products to the unbanked in Africa. You can find him [here](https://twitter.com/AndreCronjeTech)
